title: Testing the hypothesis that solvent exchange limits the rates of calcite growth and dissolution
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15743-15754
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00565A, Paper

Nikhil Rampal, Hsiu-Wen Wang, Alexander B. Brady, Jose M. Borreguero, Denys Biriukov, Eugene Mamontov, Andrew G. Stack
Using neutron scattering dynamics measurements to validate molecular dynamic simulations, it is found that the rates of solvent exchange are not likely to limit the rates of calcite crystal growth and dissolution.
